description:
Kashima Yasujirou is Kashima Miyuki`s unreliable father, who works as a plainclothes detective. Likes hitting on young girls, and rather perverted in nature. Is one of the people pursuing Wakamatsu Miyuki, even though he is already married and has a family. Cuts a deal with Wakamatsu Masato to allow the relationship between his daughter and Masato, if Masato allows his pursuit of Miyuki.
Source: AdachiFan
name: Kashima Yasujirou
